definition: to piece together/to join together/to stake all/adventurous/at the risk of one's life/to spell
to gather together, pool or collect/to happen by chance/to move close to/to exploit an opportunity

sentences.english: This program was consed up from some old subroutines.
sentences.chinese: 這套程序表是由舊的程序表副本拼湊起來的。

sentences.english: She made supper from leftovers she had thrown together.
sentences.chinese: 她用喫剩的食物拼湊成一頓晚飯。

sentences.english: It is a quick and easy way to rig up your soft plastics.
sentences.chinese: 這是一個便捷途徑拼湊你軟塑料。

sentences.english: Some of these hoaxes will be put together into a pseudo-haiku news conference.
sentences.chinese: 一些惡作劇者將這些俳句拼湊成一個僞新聞發佈會。

sentences.english: Yet scientists have been able to piece together only the sketchiest outlines of that history.
sentences.chinese: 然而，科學家至今仍僅能粗略拼湊出火星的歷史。

sentences.english: We want to put pieces together.
sentences.chinese: 我們想把他們拼湊在一起。

sentences.english: This book is just a scissors-and-paste job.
sentences.chinese: 他最近的一本書是東剪剪西抄抄拼湊而成的。

sentences.english: The letters were fixed together to make a page of print.
sentences.chinese: 這些字體拼湊在一齊可以印刷一版面。

sentences.english: The police had to fit the story together from details given by different witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 警察只好把不同目擊者所敘述的細節拼湊起來。

sentences.english: I knocked some bookshelves together from old planks.
sentences.chinese: 我用舊木板拼拼湊湊做了些書架。

sentences.english: The alternative20 is a pick-and-mix social landscape.
sentences.chinese: 可能性較大的是出現一種拼湊式的社會局面。

sentences.english: Secondly, the artistic conception of "Litchi Honey" seems to be pieced together stiffly.
sentences.chinese: 其次，《荔枝蜜》的意境有生硬拼湊之嫌。

sentences.english: The more hare-brained schemes involved cobbling together floating platforms.
sentences.chinese: 比較笨拙的方案將浮動平臺拼湊一起。

sentences.english: He vamped up some lectures out of old notes.
sentences.chinese: 他用一些舊筆記拼湊成幾篇演講稿。

sentences.english: Barça have used a lot of makeshift defences so far this season.
sentences.chinese: 巴薩本賽季已經使用了很多臨時拼湊的後防組合。

sentences.english: Sewing all the pieces of your animal face purse together will really bring your craft alive.
sentences.chinese: 縫紉你所有的動物臉錢包拼湊真的能帶來你的手藝活。

definition: to pile up/to put layer upon layer/(Tw) (computing) stack
to weave/to knit/to plait/to braid/(fig.) to create (sth abstract, e.g. a dream, a lie etc)
scene/tableau/picture/image/screen (displayed by a computer)/(motion picture) frame/field of view
to relate (a story or information)/to tell or talk about/to recount/narration/telling/narrative/account
to overlap/to superimpose/to telescope/to run together/to duplicate/one over another/superposition/an overlap/redundancy/reduplication (in Chinese grammar, e.g. 散散步[san4 san4 bu4] to have a stroll)
to design/to plot/to plan out/to compose/to draw a mental sketch/conception/plan/idea/composition
to transform/to convert/to vary/to alternate/a transformation
